title: Samsung details roadmap for 2nm chip as it expands foundry capacity
description: Samsung has outlined when it will offer advanced 2nm chips for different applications as the competition among chip makers to push the boundaries of Moore's Law continues.

title: Déjà Dup is as simple a backup tool as you'll find on Linux
description: If you're looking for the easiest method of backing up folders and files on Linux, you cannot go wrong with Déjà Dup.

title: TikTok rolled out a new way for creators to make money - but there's a catch
description: This new feature might be a double-edged sword for creators. Here's what you need to know.

title: Using your iPhone in high temperatures can cause permanent damage. Here's what not to do
description: Your gadgets don't like this heat either.

title: Flipper Zero hacking tool is a big hit
description: Despite supply chain issues resulting in the device being out of stock for weeks on end, the company behind the Flipper Zero is on track to sell $80 million worth of units this year.

title: The first GPT-powered smart home platform is here
description: This is just the first of likely many generative AI-enabled smart home platforms to come.

title: Nvidia teams up with Snowflake for large language model AI
description: Snowflake extends its Snowpark offering with GPU instances to run foundation models from Nvidia's NeMo framework -- to be further trained on customer data stored in Snowflake.

title: These headphones make it possible to listen to music while swimming
description: The H2O Audio Sonar Pro are water-resistant bone conduction headphones that worked incredibly well in my tests.

title: These two AI models claim to be better than ChatGPT. Here's what we know
description: ChatGPT set the bar for AI chatbots and now competitors are trying their best to beat it.

title: AI ethics toolkit updated to include more assessment components
description: The second iteration of the Veritas Toolkit includes assessment methodologies for accountability and transparency, to guide financial institutions on the 'responsible' use of artificial intelligence.

title: How to take macro focus video with Pixel 7/Pixel 7 Pro
description: With the latest Android update, Pixel 7 phones gained the ability to use macro focus in videos. Here's how to use it.

title: New Apple patent suggests you'll wear Vision Pro headset at NFL games
description: Apple was granted a patent to visually augment in-person sports games for Vision Pro users. Would you compromise social norms to experience this technology?

title: Get Microsoft Office on your PC or Mac for just $40
description: You can buy a lifetime license for Microsoft Office 2021 at a major discount right now.

title: Apple's WatchOS 10 gets new APIs and designs to build next-gen watch apps
description: Developers get access to the Apple Watch's redesigned app formats and upgraded features in the WatchOS 10 SDK.

title: How to combine Linux commands together for a more efficient experience
description: When you finally start working with the Linux command line, you'll find numerous ways to make the process more efficient. By running two or more commands at once, you'll not have to wait until one finishes to start the next.

title: The Pixel 8 could bring back a buzzword that was once the talk of the tech industry
description: The upcoming Pixel 8 phones could include a feature that might totally disrupt the desktop and laptop space and greatly benefit consumers.

title: This $100 smart fan is powerful enough to cool your whole room
description: The Dreo Falcon S smart fan moves a lot of air. Here's what else it can (and can't) do

title: Higher education plays a big role in preparing graduates for an AI-led economy
description: A career development expert at the best college for entrepreneurship shares how higher education institutions should prepare their students for the future of work.

title: Samsung SmartThings to use AI to optimize home energy use
description: SmartThings users also now have more ways to save money and earn rewards.

title: I found the ultimate vlogging camera, and it's not much bigger than your thumb
description: The new Insta360 Go 3 sees improved battery life, 1440p recording, and one of the most ingenious companion accessories yet.

title: The best early Amazon Prime Day deals: TVs, phones, AirPods, robot vacuums, more
description: Don't wait to start your Prime Day shopping. You can save now on tons of products from Apple, Samsung, Google, iRobot, and more, including Amazon itself.
